name: supercharge
description:
supercharge any minecraft tool to prevent cooldown (fabric 1.14)
craft the supercharger block by placing 5 iron blocks in an X formation together with 4 quartz shaped like a diamond
if you're a server operator, the command /supercharge will add the item to your inventory automatically
breaking the supercharger block with any compatible tool will remove the cooldown after swinging
you can see if this effect is active by hovering over the item!
thanks for using supercharge  :)  please check out CurseForge and Github for updates by clicking the links above
